results.title: DMN Modeler - UX Review
results.description: The UX team shows the latest design proposal for the latest DMN Modeler and a few larger items are discussed with the field.

results.title: Process Designer NEXT Review
results.description: The current implementation of Process Designer NEXT is reviewed with the larger team during a hackathon. The discussion and feedback are captured in this recording.

results.title: Review of Decision Manager Installer (with EAP and Tomcat support)
results.description: The current installer Decision Manager (with EAP and Tomcat support) is demoed and discussed with the field and UX.

results.title: Review of Installer (EAP and Tomcat)
results.description: The current installer for EAP is demoed and discussed with the field and UX.

results.title: Running Decision Manager on OpenShift
results.description: This meeting captures how the user can use OpenShift to create a project and run Decision Manager. There are a few hiccups finishing the process, but the UI is reviewed at the end of the meeting running in a different location.

results.title: Decision Manager 7.0 - Getting Started Experience
results.description: The current getting started experience for Decision Manager 7.0 is shown and reviewed with the field and UX.

results.title: Review of current Dashbuilder, Pages, and Dashboards
results.description: David Gutierrez (BPM Developer) demos the current implementation of Dashbuilder, Pages, and Dashboards and discusses any feedback from the field and UX.

results.title: Scalable Workspaces Design Review
results.description: The UX team walks through the current design for Scalable Workspaces and takes in feedback from the field.

results.title: Entando and End-User Applications
results.description: PM walks through Entando and shows a demo video highlighting how it can be used in customer discussions.

results.title: Process and Task List / Table Design Review
results.description: Liz Clayton shows off the Task List / Table Designs she is working on and gets feedback from the Field.

results.title: New Product Installer and Installation Experience
results.description: Developers show off the latest and greatest installation experience and hear feedback from the field.

results.title: Project Navigation and Workflow
results.description: The current product navigation and workflow is reviewed and discussed with the Field.

results.title: Product Terminology and Component Naming
results.description: Discussion with the tech writers and field around naming in the product.

results.title: Process Admin Console wireframe review
results.description: We review and hear feedback from the field on the process admin console design.

results.title: Column Wizard design review
results.description: A new proposal for the column wizard is reviewed with the field.

results.title: Information Architecture Card Sort Results and Write up
results.description: A study was done with the field regarding how they envision the concepts of the product would live together in the UI.
